column5: It's on! This is the first official fish of the open water 2015 season. Congratulations to Pasha Lake's new hire Jonathan S! Ice is officially gone on all inland lakes. Satellite photos show Nipigon breaking up around the shorelines. We are going out nightly in search of the coming smelt run!
Looking forward to tying into some of those big boys in 14 days!
Where can I download up to date or recent satellite photos?
